overview: Prior to joining DaneVest Capital, Mr. Wilkosz was President and owner of Resource Consulting LLC, since 2005. Prior to that, Mr. Wilkosz was President of Schweiger Furniture, Division of KCS International, Inc. since 2000. Overall, Mr. Wilkosz has 25 years experience in managing, organizing and developing companies in various manufacturing, distribution and service industries such as United Parcel Service and Sunbelt Business Brokers. Mr. Wilkosz has spent the majority of his career with a focus on business planning, startups, business turn around and business mentoring. Mr. Wilkosz is a graduate of UW Madison and holds a business broker license.
